examples: You mustn't let yourself get depressed.
She felt very depressed about the future.
Se sintió muy deprimida por el futuro.
He was really depressed at the thought of going into the office.
Estaba realmente deprimido ante la idea de ir a la oficina.
She was depressed over the recent death of her mother.
Estaba deprimida por la reciente muerte de su madre.
